DOC.brief_summary: The evaluate use diffusion E-learning programme Diagnostic Evaluation Dementia among General Practitioners ( GPs ) Denmark . The hypothesis : 1 . The GPs use guide instruction 2 . The GPs use programme frequently young GPs . 3 . GPs work rural area use programme frequently
DOC.detailed_description: In period november 2006 may 2007 log file GPs log E-learning programme keep Danish Medical Association . They hand principal investigator anonymous form .
DOC.criteria: GPs stop work GPs study period
